Title: Thunder Calls
Description:
The time to attack the Thunder King has come!

A small group of Kirin Tor awaits you near the Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.

Report to Vereesa Windrunner for further instructions.
ObjectivesText: Report to Vereesa Windrunner at the Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.
RewardText: We must move quickly, $n! The others have gone ahead of us, but I will brief you in the flight over.
